archimate:Deliverable.name: Communication plan finalized
archimate:Deliverable.documentation:
Our communication plan needs to be comprehensive to secure wide adoption of the repository. Spontaneous adoption of any new tool is typically low in our company. When creating the communication plan, we need to consider both the launch of the repository as well as its ongoing use.
Current thinking: * Repository needs to be promoted - e.g. Workplace * There should be trainings on Teams * We should personally approach known key contacts in sales/customer teams to recruit them to use the repository and spread the word of it - think key users * We should build a community around the repository - e.g. Teams, and make sure the community is live with content. We can also use this to get feedback and new questions.
